h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Key Items Locations
h3_title: From IGN Shopping: Our Favorite Gaming Accessory Right Now
img_above_text:
# Key Items
Key Items are an integral part of the progression in Black Myth: Wukong"). Some of them are placed naturally along the main path through the game. However, quite a few are hidden in secret areas or locked behind optional bosses. These key items can open up new secret areas, spawn new bosses, and, in some cases, allow you to get new loot, upgrades, and resources.
In this guide, we will go over each of the Key Items and where you can find them. You can also find details on what each of these Key Items does and where to use them.
## Black Myth: Wukong Key Items Locations
Below, you can find a list of all the Key Items in Black Myth: Wukong, where they are located, and the use for each of them. Clicking on each one will take you to a breakdown of where to find them in more detail. You can also use our Walkthrough. Additionally, you can also check each one off as you obtain them.
Image | Key Item | Rarity | Description | Location | Where To Use It | Collected
---|---|---|---|---|---|---
### From IGN Shopping: Our Favorite Gaming Accessory Right Now
Dropped by the boss | • Used alongside the other Skandha key items to create the Skandhas Pill from Xu Dog in Yellow Wind Ridge| Skandha of Consciousness
